name: 科技預測
description: Technology forecasting attempts to predict the future characteristics and development trends of technology. The technology forecasting capabilities are essentials for production, marketing and R&D managers’ decision making in technology firms. Thus, this course intends to introduce modern technology forecasting theories and practices to the MOT majored graduate level students. Major emphasis of this course will be placed on theory introductions and forecasting techniques manipulations. Students are expected to learn forecasting techniques through lectures and case studies.
goals: 熟悉常用科技預測方法與使用時機
科技預測與投資決策有效連結
實際動手進行技術預測議題演練

Week 17: Technology Assessment
